transcript:
Customer: Hello

Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello. Haan ji.
Customer: Main IndiaMART se baat kar raha hun?
Executive: Haan ji, IndiaMART se baat kar raha hun, bataiye.
Customer: Actually mujhe ek manager provide kar matlab profile ban gayi hai meri aur aapne aap matlab maine profile banwa li to unhone bola tha sir manager provide kar denge leads ke liye.
Executive: Haan haan, aap naam batayenge apna?
Customer: Mera naam Shakti Gupta hai.
Executive: Aapki us jo profile bani hai IndiaMART pe kis naam se bani hai?
Customer: Wo meri wo bani hai Shiv Shakti Infra Solution se.
Executive: Shiv Shakti Infra Solution. Sir main aaj leave par hun. Actually aapka jo manager hai wo mujhe hi provide kiya gaya hai. To maine waha pe apply kiya hua hai due to some my personal issue main aaj office mein available nahi ho paya. To jo bhi aapki further assistance hogi to main kal aapko sari cheeze provide kar dunga matlab Tuesday ko. Kyunki aaj main office mein available nahi hun. To haan bataiye.
Customer: Sir aap face to face aayenge kal?
Executive: Haan main aapke sang kal video meet arrange kar lunga to sari cheeze main aapko explain explain kar dunga. Aap mujhe apna time slot bata do jisse main aapko kal Tuesday ko connect kar lu usi time pe.
Customer: Morning mein kitne baje aa raha hai waise?
Executive: Morning mein 11 baje. Perfect hai sir.
Customer: Okay theek hai. Aur koi issue sir iske alawa?
Customer: No no koi issue nahi hai bas theek hai. Main kal aapko morning by 11 a.m. positively connect karta hun. Right sir?
Executive: Okay. Actually mere paas jo leads aayi thi wo contact matlab bricks bricks manufacturer walon ki aayi thi bahut sari to maine leads tab le to liya hai.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: But usme lead khatam bata rahi hai matlab main kal haan main kal sir aapki profile study karta hun aur aapke jitne bhi questions honge aapko connect karne se pehle sara homework karke rakhunga to jo bhi aapko aaj issues face ho rahe hain aap ek bar check out kar lo aur sari cheeze aap mujhe kal explain out kar dena detail mein to hum log over the video meet ek main aapko demo bhi provide kar dunga aur exhaustively hum log discuss bhi kar lenge ki kya kya main main issue aapko face ho raha hai.
Customer: Theek hai, theek hai sir okay.
Executive: Okay. Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants a manager to be provided for leads.

- Leads showing as expired.



Resolution:

- Executive informed he is the assigned manager.

- Will connect via video call on Tuesday at 11 AM.

- Will study the profile and resolve issues.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect on Tuesday at 11 AM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- leads, manager, profile, video meet
